title: NBA Finals: Lakers vs Celtics Showdown Begins
description: Historic rivals face off in Game 1 of the NBA Finals at TD Garden. Fans predict a seven-game thriller.

title: Oscars 2024: Nolan's Epic Wins Best Picture
description: Christopher Nolan's 'Oppenheimer' sweeps 7 awards, including Best Director and Cinematography.

title: India Tests Hypersonic Missile in Odisha
description: DRDO successfully launches BrahMos-II, capable of Mach 7 speeds, bolstering defense capabilities.

title: IPL 2024: Kohli's Century Seals Playoff Spot
description: RCB defeats Mumbai Indians as Kohli scores 112* off 63 balls. Playoffs begin Friday in Ahmedabad.

title: Bollywood's 'Kalki 2898 AD' Breaks Global Records
description: Prabhas-starrer sci-fi epic earns ₹800 crore worldwide in opening week, surpassing 'RRR'.

title: AU Launches Indigenous Satellite Network
description: Australia's $1.2bn 'SkyNet' project aims to improve rural internet connectivity by 2026.

title: Ashes 2025: MCG to Host Day-Night Test
description: Cricket Australia announces pink-ball Ashes Test in Melbourne, sparking fan excitement.

title: Germany Unveils AI-Powered Healthcare Chatbot
description: Berlin launches 'MediBot' to reduce hospital wait times. 87% accuracy in preliminary trials.

title: Bundesliga: Leverkusen Clinches Title
description: Undefeated Bayer Leverkusen secures first Bundesliga trophy in 120-year history.

title: UK's NHS Rolls Out Cancer Vaccine Trials
description: Personalized mRNA vaccines show 60% success rate in early-stage trials across 10 hospitals.

title: Premier League: Man City Wins Fourth Straight Title
description: Guardiola's squad defeats Arsenal 3-1 to secure unprecedented quadruple.

title: Hollywood Strike Ends With Streaming Profit Deal
description: SAG-AFTRA secures 4% revenue share from platforms like Netflix. Production resumes June 1.

title: India's Chandrayaan-4 Targets Lunar South Pole
description: ISRO announces 2026 mission to deploy rover and study water ice deposits.

title: AU Wildfire Defense System Goes Live
description: AI-powered sensors now cover 80% of bushfire-prone areas. Early tests show 90% accuracy.

title: Berlin Film Festival Winners Announced
description: German drama 'Winter Light' wins Golden Bear. Full list of awardees inside.

title: US Launches Mars Habitat Simulation in Arizona
description: NASA's year-long mission prepares astronauts for future Mars colonization. Four crew members begin isolation.

title: India's First Underwater Metro Opens in Kolkata
description: The 16-km Hooghly River crossing reduces travel time by 70%. PM Modi inaugurates Phase 1.

title: AU Rugby League Bans Tackles Above Shoulder Height
description: New player safety rules implemented after concussion studies. Effective from 2025 season.

title: Germany's Fusion Reactor Achieves 30-Minute Sustained Burn
description: Wendelstein 7-X stellarator marks breakthrough in clean energy research.

title: UK Deploys AI Drones to Monitor Migrant Crossings
description: New Channel surveillance system reduces unauthorized entries by 45%, says Home Office.

title: Hollywood's First AI-Generated Movie Sparks Debate
description: ‘Neon Dreams’ uses zero human actors. SAG-AFTRA calls for regulations.

title: India Unveils World's Largest Solar Farm in Rajasthan
description: 10 GW facility powers 8 million homes. Part of 2070 net-zero pledge.

title: AU Scientists Discover Coral Reef Regeneration 'Hotspots'
description: Great Barrier Reef areas show 40% recovery after heat-resistant algae introduction.

title: Bundesliga Introduces Semi-Automated Offside Technology
description: Hawkeye system reduces VAR delays. Tested in Bayern vs Leipzig match.

title: UK's First Vertical Takeoff Electric Plane Completes Test Flight
description: Zero-emission aircraft aims for London-Paris routes by 2028.

title: Mumbai Hosts First Formula E Grand Prix
description: Mahindra Racing secures pole position. Race draws 85,000 spectators.

title: Germany Legalizes Medical Psychedelics for Depression Treatment
description: MDMA and psilocybin therapy available at 12 clinics from September 2024.

title: AU Navy Launches Stealth Drone Submarine Fleet
description: Ghost Shark drones to patrol Indo-Pacific waters. $3.9bn defense contract signed.

title: Broadway's 'Hamilton' Launches Hindi Adaptation in Mumbai
description: 30-week run begins at Nita Mukesh Ambani Cultural Centre. Tickets sell out in 3 hours.

title: UK Develops Laser Weapon to Counter Russian Satellites
description: DragonFire system successfully tested in Wales. Operational by 2027.

title: Silicon Valley's AI Startup Reaches $10bn Valuation in 18 Months
description: NeuroTech's brain-computer interface attracts Google and Elon Musk investments.

title: Germany Wins Eurovision 2024 with AI-Composed Song
description: ‘Electric Heart’ blends human vocals with neural network melodies. Controversy erupts.

title: AU Astronomers Detect Radio Signals from 9 Billion Light-Years Away
description: ASKAP telescope captures evidence of ancient galaxy formation.

title: India's National Chess Champion Defeats Magnus Carlsen
description: 18-year-old Ramesh Iyer wins World Blitz Championship in Oslo.

title: London's Tate Modern Hosts Immersive Van Gogh Exhibition
description: Projection-mapped show features 4,000 moving artworks. Runs until January 2025.

title: US Army Tests Exoskeleton Suits for Infantry
description: TALOS Mark IV prototypes enhance strength and endurance. Field trials in Texas.

title: Delhi Launches Emergency Heatwave Action Plan
description: Mobile cooling centers and 24/7 power guarantees as temperatures hit 49°C.

title: AU Wine Exports to China Resume After Tariff Lift
description: First shipment of Barossa Valley Shiraz reaches Shanghai. Trade deal valued at $1bn.

title: Frankfurt Stock Exchange Launches AI Trading Floor
description: Algorithmic systems handle 60% of transactions. Human traders protest job cuts.

title: UK's Stonehenge Tunnel Project Approved After Decade-Long Debate
description: 4.5km underground route aims to reduce traffic near World Heritage Site.

title: California Mandates All-Electric School Buses by 2035
description: $2.8bn funding package announced. First 1,000 buses deployed in LAUSD.

title: Hyderabad Becomes India's First 100% Solar-Powered Metro City
description: 300MW solar farm offsets entire public transport energy needs.

title: AU Open Golf Tournament Adds Women's Legends Division
description: Annika Sörenstam and Karrie Webb confirmed for 2025 Melbourne event.

title: Volkswagen Reveals Flying Car Prototype in Munich
description: Electric vertical takeoff vehicle completes 15-minute test flight.

title: Edinburgh Fringe Festival Adds AI Comedy Category
description: Neural network-generated stand-up routines compete for ‘Circuit Breaker’ award.

title: Texas Approves Statewide Bitcoin Mining Incentives
description: Tax breaks for companies using renewable energy. Expected to create 5,000 jobs.

title: India's National Museum Returns Stolen Artifacts to Cambodia
description: 12th-century statues looted during Khmer Rouge era repatriated.

title: AU Scientists Grow Climate-Resistant Wheat in Lab
description: New strain yields 20% more in drought conditions. Field trials begin in 2025.

title: German Court Bans TikTok Data Transfers to China
description: Ruling cites national security concerns. ByteDance appeals decision.

title: UK's First 3D-Printed Neighborhood Breaks Ground in Bristol
description: 150 eco-homes to be completed by 2026. Prices 30% below market average.

title: SpaceX Launches First All-Civilian Crew to ISS
description: Four passengers pay $55 million each for 10-day orbital mission.

title: Chennai Hosts World Yoga Championship
description: 2,500 participants from 60 countries. India wins 15 gold medals.

title: AU & NZ Announce Joint Antarctic Research Station
description: Zero-emission facility to study climate change. Operational by 2028.

title: Hamburg Port Fully Automates Cargo Handling
description: AI cranes and driverless trucks cut processing time by 40%.

title: Wimbledon Introduces AI Line Judges for 2024 Championship
description: Hawk-Eye system replaces all human officials. Players approve decision.
